definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: then they were taught how to barter on the street with a paperclip.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，他們還需要在大街上用回形針來交換東西。

sentences.english: Fasten these papers together with a paperclip.
sentences.chinese: 用回形針把這些文件夾在一起。

sentences.english: Use a paper clip to hold this file together.
sentences.chinese: 用一個回形針把這份檔案夾起來。

sentences.english: Get a paperclip or safety pin and bend it straight.
sentences.chinese: 拿一個回形針或安全別針然後將它弄直。

sentences.english: One at a time, push each pin up with the paperclip.
sentences.chinese: 用回形針將鎖裏的針腳一個一個地挑起來。

sentences.english: Today, the paperclip… tomorrow, who knows what?
sentences.chinese: 而今天是一個回形針，誰又知道明天會是什麼呢？

sentences.english: I used to join up all his paper clips in a long chain.
sentences.chinese: 我過去常把他所有的回形針串連成一長串。

sentences.english: Feel around the keyhole with the paperclip until you locate the pins.
sentences.chinese: 用回形針在鎖洞裏轉動，直到感覺出裏面的彈子。
